data.text:
@katiecouric @ADL_National @JGreenblattADL @NYTMetro tweeted 10/31: "Are well-meaning liberals unwittingly complicit in the city's rising anti-Semitism?"

It attached its article, which reports that no far right-wing group was associated with any anti-Semitic NYC hate crime during past 22 months. https://t.co/0qbmymeuPQ
@katiecouric @JGreenblattADL @ADL_National Great conversation.  Everyone should take a listen.
